string.name: santa_locked
string.translation_description: Tooltip. Santa is unavailable until a certain date

string.name: present_quest_locked
string.translation_description: Tooltip. Game is unavailable until a certain date. PresentQuest is a game where player walks around the real world looking for presents.

string.name: gumball_locked
string.translation_description: Tooltip. Game is unavailable until a certain date. Gumball is a game where player has to tilt phone to drop gumballs on a target.

resources.string: Spelet Gumball går att spela den 1 december.

string.name: memory_locked
string.translation_description: Tooltip. Game is unavailable until a certain date. Memory is a game where player has to complete a memory matching task.

resources.string: Spelet Memory går att spela den 1 december.

string.name: elf_jetpack_locked
string.translation_description: Tooltip. Game is unavailable until a certain date. Elf Jetpack is a game where player is an elf flying with a jetpack.

resources.string: Spelet Elf Jetpack går att spela den 1 december.

string.name: rocket_locked
string.translation_description: Tooltip. Game is unavailable until a certain date. Rocket sleigh is a game where player is an elf riding a rocket-powered sleigh.

resources.string: Spelet Rocket Sleigh går att spela den 1 december.

string.name: dancer_locked
string.translation_description: Tooltip. Game is unavailable until a certain date. Dasher Dancer is a game name. Dasher is the name of Santa's reindeer. Player can make him dance. The name benefits from rhyming.

resources.string: Spelet Dasher Dancer går att spela den 1 december.

string.name: snowdown_locked
string.translation_description: Tooltip. Game is unavailable until a certain date. Snowdown is a play on words based on Showdown, with snow.

resources.string: Du kan spela Snowdown från den 1 december.

string.name: city_quiz_locked
string.translation_description: Tooltip. Game is unavailable until a certain date. City Quiz is a game where player is shown pictures of cities and asked to select the correct location on a map.

string.name: generic_game_disabled
string.translation_description: Tooltip. Game is unavailable for an unknown reason. Placeholder is the game name.

string.name: video
string.translation_description: Description of a button that plays a video.

string.name: video_locked
string.translation_description: Tooltip. Video is unavailable until specified date. Variable is a day in December

resources.string: Vi låser upp videon den %1$d december.

string.name: video_disabled
string.translation_description: Tooltip. Video is unavailable for an unknown reason

resources.string: Videon går inte att spela upp just nu.

string.name: sign_in
string.translation_description: Asks users to sign in with Google account for leaderboards and achievements

resources.string: Logga in så kan du se topplistor och resultat

string.name: play
string.translation_description: Label indicating an action that can be taken. Will be used to label game content that can be played.

string.name: watch
string.translation_description: Label indicating an action that can be taken. Will be used to label video content that can be watched.
